infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We use your camera so you can record fingerboard clips for the event.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We use your microphone to capture audio while recording clips.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We access your photo library so you can pick clips to upload.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Fingerboard Con to use the camera to record clips.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Fingerboard Con to use the microphone while recording.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Fingerboard Con to access your photos for uploads.
